title: Average U.S. brand response rate on social media 2017 , by vertical
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average response rate for 15 number of Months.
Month Utilities has the highest Average response rate and Media/Entertainment has the lowest Average response rate.
The highest Month Utilities has 12.0 more Average response rate than the lowest Month Media/Entertainment.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average response rate for 15 number of Months.
The Average response rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Utilities and lowest at Month Media/Entertainment.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average response rate for 15 number of Months.
Month Utilities has the highest Average response rate and Media/Entertainment has the lowest Average response rate.
The highest Month Utilities has 12.0 more Average response rate than the lowest Month Media/Entertainment.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average response rate for 15 number of Months.
The Average response rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Utilities and lowest at Month Media/Entertainment.
Month Retail has the second highest value for Average response rate.
The Average response rate of Month Utilities is 3.0% larger than the minimum value at Media/Entertainment.
Month Utilities is higher than any other Months with value 18.0, followed by Retail, and Consumer Goods. Down to Month Media/Entertainment with the lowest value 6.0.
Overall Average response rate has decreased over the Months.
Similar Average response rate is found in Month Internet/Technology, Marketing/Advertising, and Automotive.
The Month Media/Entertainment tends to be 1.67 percent lower than average.
